name: Using function sp_addmessage - Unsupported in Azure SQL Database

platformMigration.description: Using ‘sys.fn_my_permissions’ is not a supported function in Azure SQL Database. It should be removed or replaced by an equivalent function supported in Azure. When used on on-premise SQL databases, this function stores a new user-defined error message in an instance of the SQL Server Database Engine. Messages stored by using sp_addmessage can be viewed by using the sys.messages catalog view.
